Afflicted Irnakurse.name: Afflicted Irnakurse
Afflicted Irnakurse.publicNotes:
Irnakurse are surface elves who drow have subjected to particularly cruel and humiliating fleshwarping practices, as drow take special delight in the torment of their surface-dwelling kin. The process of crafting an irnakurse involves twisting an unfortunate elf into a deformed mass of misplaced limbs, loose flesh, and bony protrusions-parts that should be internal are often left on full display to the world. Irnakurse are subject to mental conditioning that causes them to hate their prior forms, and these creatures prefer to attack surface elves over all other targets.

Horrid abominations reshaped by vile alchemical magic, the two fleshwarps presented here were created by drow, who transform captured elves or xulgaths into twisted monstrosities that can then be loosed to cause havoc and terror.

bxjYZ892TLi9AizW.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

PXA2uFcT0VRiQkBO.name: Fearful Curse
PXA2uFcT0VRiQkBO.description: The irnakurse is permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}, which lowers its effective level by 1.

o40ddeHAtx8cJ0uY.name: Mind Lash
o40ddeHAtx8cJ0uY.description:
A non-evil creature hit by an irnakurse's tentacle is overwhelmed with corrupted images of a ruined life and must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 4} on a critical failure).

After attempting this save, a creature is temporarily immune to Mind Lash for 24 hours.

jr6lRjG0ZeZgW116.name: Soul Scream
jr6lRjG0ZeZgW116.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The irnakurse unleashes an alien shriek of nightmarish horror and pain. All non-evil creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save. The irnakurse can Sustain Soul Scream for up to 6 rounds; each time it does, it repeats the effect.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected, and is temporarily immune to Soul Scream for 24 hours.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is stupefied 1. Further failed saves against Soul Scream increase the condition value by 1, to a maximum of stupefied 4. Each time the character gets a full night's rest, the stupefied condition gained from Soul Scream decreases by 1.

Critical Failure As failure, except the stupefied value increases by 2 instead of by 1.

ml69ZMPwkVsbCTC7.name: Storm of Tentacles
ml69ZMPwkVsbCTC7.description: The irnakurse makes up to four tentacle Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the irnakurse's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all of its attacks.

rzTC3Hz3hT9xd3W9.name: Consume Tattooed Flesh
rzTC3Hz3hT9xd3W9.description:
Requirements Aller is adjacent to a tattooed scrap of flesh or to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour

Aller devours a bite of flesh and regains [[/r {4d6}[healing]]]{4d6 Hit Points}. If the piece of flesh was tattooed, he is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} and can use this extra action to make a jaws Strike.

Aller then can't Consume Flesh for [[/br 1d4 #Consume Flesh Recharge]]{1d4 rounds}. He has one piece of tattooed flesh on his person.

H61mcURmEhYdmt9L.name: Ghoul Fever
H61mcURmEhYdmt9L.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage} and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day)

Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day)

Stage 4 [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage} and gains no benefit from healing (1 day)

Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day)

Stage 6 dead, and rises as a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.LHHgGSs0ELCR4CYK]{Ghoul} the next midnight.

WCcurB9iEOCcU58H.name: Paralysis
WCcurB9iEOCcU58H.description: Any living, non-elf creature hit by Aller's attack must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

5YFP1XKwVqEkmjZV.name: Swift Leap
5YFP1XKwVqEkmjZV.description: Aller jumps up to half his Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

NyXCVjhHwWZtpfOI.name: Consume Flesh
NyXCVjhHwWZtpfOI.description:
Requirements Augrael is adjacent to the corpse of an undead creature that was destroyed within the last hour.

Effect Augrael devours a chunk of the destroyed undead creature and regains [[/r {2d6}[healing]]]{2d6 Hit Points}.

He can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

XKiDDCClxzUDYSO8.name: Ghoul Fever
XKiDDCClxzUDYSO8.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage} and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day)

Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day)

Stage 4 [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage} and gains no benefit from healing (1 day)

Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day)

Stage 6 dead, and rises as a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.LHHgGSs0ELCR4CYK]{Ghoul} the next midnight.

0QhLcUbXJtWWVCmp.name: Paralysis
0QhLcUbXJtWWVCmp.description: Any living, non-elf creature hit by Augrael's attack must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

D8o83tvKi46maS3U.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
D8o83tvKi46maS3U.description:
Augrael deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

zZQXw3WG7NLAQrux.name: Swift Leap
zZQXw3WG7NLAQrux.description: Augrael jumps up to half his Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Azvalvigander.name: Azvalvigander
Azvalvigander.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Azvalvigander.publicNotes:
Zebubs serve as Hell's messengers and spies. Their ability to share what they've seen with other creatures makes them especially useful-not only to other devils, but also to mortal conjurers. Some infernal lords unleash them in enormous, horrid swarms upon unsuspecting lands to debase flesh and land alike while collecting secrets the infernal host might later put to use. Zebubs use any opportunity to manipulate weak-willed or easily tempted mortals into serving the zebubs' whims. While arrogant and deceitful, zebubs lack the cunning and confidence of most devils, and thus their schemes often focus on satisfying self-serving or self-destructive ambitions. Zebubs form from the souls of childish and craven mortals, reshaped by the archdevil Baalzebul in the frozen, filthy wastes of Hell's seventh layer, Cocytus.

Each type of devil plays a particular role in Hell's bureaucracies and hierarchies, though some have far more specialized functions than others.

BkBEhqLM3mXNI13M.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
BkBEhqLM3mXNI13M.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

lQzCQf7gDhv2S88W.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only)
lQzCQf7gDhv2S88W.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

JLbHt0LM9WGhFhGj.name: 召唤动物(仅限集群) Summon Animal (Swarm creatures only)
JLbHt0LM9WGhFhGj.description:
你创造一个为你而战的动物。你召唤一个具有动物特征的常见生物，其等级为-1。升阶该法术会增加你能召唤的生物的最大等级。

升阶 (2环级) 等级 1

升阶 (3环级) 等级 2

升阶 (4环级) 等级 3

升阶 (5环级) 等级 5

升阶 (6环级) 等级 7

升阶 (7环级) 等级 9

升阶 (8环级) 等级 11

升阶 (9环级) 等级 13

升阶 (10环级) 等级 15

POLjXIhCSeQBrvcV.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

LNbjPm5a6CTl4lko.name: Infernal Eye
LNbjPm5a6CTl4lko.description:
The zebub records everything they see, and though they don't remember all observations, they can pass them along to another creature.

The zebub replays 10 minutes of witnessed events to a touched willing creature, which receives the memories in a flash of information. By remaining in contact, the zebub can spend additional 3-action activities to replay more information.

After relaying their visions to another, the zebub can't ever recall those events again.

QZup3O3zcKH6TFZd.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
QZup3O3zcKH6TFZd.description:
The zebub's Strikes deal an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Barbazu (AV-C24).name: Barbazu (AV-C24)
Barbazu (AV-C24).allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic
Barbazu (AV-C24).publicNotes:
Barbazus, known also as bearded devils or infantry devils, are murderous fiends who satiate their lust for annihilation by serving as the foot soldiers of Hell's armies, often leading hordes of lesser devils such as imps and lemures into battle. Bearded devils wield serrated glaives to inflict jagged gashes that resist healing magic, resulting in tremendous blood loss. When enemies come too close, bearded devils strike with the spines of their wriggling beards to deliver a wretched contagion called Avernal fever, savoring the sight of their victim's strength being slowly devoured from within.

Barbazus can be found savagely indulging the whims of evil infernal lords from all layers of Hell, rejoicing as they disseminate murder, misery, and anguish as they see fit.

Masters of corruption and architects of conquest, devils seek both to tempt mortal life to join in their pursuit of all things profane and to spread tyranny throughout all worlds. The temptations they offer mortals range from great powers granted by the signing of an infernal contract to twisted favors following a whispered pledge to a diabolic patron, or any number of even subtler exchanges. Those who succumb to these temptations find themselves consigned to an afterlife of endless torment in the pits of Hell, wherein the only hope of escape lies in the chance of being promoted to become a devil in the infernal ranks. Every devil has a specific role to play in the upkeep of the remorseless bureaucratic machine that is Hell, from soldiers and scholars to inquisitors, lawyers, judges, and executioners. Lowly lemures and imps perform subservient labor to more powerful and specialized devils, such as contract devils and erinyes, while the greatest pit fiends command entire infernal armies.

j5nOoy2JdxGbg96d.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
j5nOoy2JdxGbg96d.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

jiUi7cG1ldGKfHsM.name: Hellforged Glaive
jiUi7cG1ldGKfHsM.description: This polearm consists of a long, single‑edged blade on the end of a 7‑foot pole. It is extremely effective at delivering lethal cuts at a distance.

fOXEVyfWiHQRSyiC.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

T108hwN1OhACYQdQ.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

GZ55vWFhwaHyhnfM.name: Avernal Fever
GZ55vWFhwaHyhnfM.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 day)

SNJ0RSCREyP9YYKY.name: Infernal Wound
SNJ0RSCREyP9YYKY.description:
A bearded devil's glaive Strike also deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] that resists attempts to heal it.

The flat check to stop the bleeding starts at @Check[type:flat|dc:20]. The DC is reduced to @Check[type:flat|dc:15] only if the bleeding creature or an ally successfully assists with the recovery. The DC to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} to a creature with an infernal wound is increased by 5.

A spellcaster or item attempting to use healing magic on a creature suffering from an infernal wound must succeed at a DC 21 counteract check or the magic fails to heal the creature.

zQUhdB7kvudfGv5Z.name: Reposition
zQUhdB7kvudfGv5Z.description:
Trigger The devil hits a creature with a glaive Strike.

Effect The devil moves the creature 5 feet in any direction. The destination square must be within reach of the devil's glaive.

This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

6zbiPHhWaAV5pJd6.name: Wriggling Beard
6zbiPHhWaAV5pJd6.description:
Frequency once per round.

Effect The barbazu makes a beard Strike. This Strike ignores their multiple attack penalty and doesn't count toward that penalty.

T108hwN1OhACYQdQ.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

GZ55vWFhwaHyhnfM.name: Avernal Fever
GZ55vWFhwaHyhnfM.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 day)

Vo6AHVWsAnxqkwLW.name: 赶畜皮带 Drover's Band
Vo6AHVWsAnxqkwLW.description:
启动 3 命令

频率 每天一次

效果 你将意识施加到30尺内的一个无心智生物上。如果目标是一个等级不超过3级的无心智生物，它必须通过@Check[type:will|dc:20]豁免。如果你是魔鬼，目标的豁免结果的成功度将下降一个级别。

大成功 目标生物不受影响

成功 由于被你的命令扰乱，目标生物陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续1轮

失败 目标生物在1小时内@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{被控制 Controlled}，但它不会遵从明显会导致自我毁灭的命令。

大失败 类似失败，但是持续时间为1天。

SNJ0RSCREyP9YYKY.name: Infernal Wound
SNJ0RSCREyP9YYKY.description:
A bearded devil's glaive Strike also deals @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] that resists attempts to heal it.

The flat check to stop the bleeding starts at @Check[type:flat|dc:20]. The DC is reduced to @Check[type:flat|dc:15] only if the bleeding creature or an ally successfully assists with the recovery. The DC to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} to a creature with an infernal wound is increased by 5.

A spellcaster or item attempting to use healing magic on a creature suffering from an infernal wound must succeed at a DC 21 counteract check or the magic fails to heal the creature.
